description: Total distance to summit and return is 9km.The hike is partially within boundary of Charleston Lake Prov. Park.Limited parking by roadside.The trail begins by following an unmaintained township concession, northwards, and then is signed with blue diamond markers with a hiker symbol to the summit.
directions: From 401, exit 659 North on County Rd 3 through Lansdowne to Warburton Rd.Turn right (east) and continue along Warburton Rd. until it meets Blue Mountain RdPark on the corner
title: Blue Mountain CLPP
